questions.question: In your country, how many specialist surgical workforce per 100,000 population are there on average?
Based on the average percentage of population affected by communicable diseases and maternal, prenatal, and nutrition conditions, how would you rate the health situation?
In your country, how much fertilizer (in kilograms) is consumed on average per hectare of arable land?
Considering the average number of agricultural machinery (tractors) per 100 square kilometers of arable land, how advanced is the agricultural sector?
What percentage of total employment is in agricultural employment on average?
